Class ApplicantService

java.lang.Object
Service.ApplicantService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantService
Direct Known Subclasses:
OfficerService
public class ApplicantService extends Object implements IApplicantService
ApplicantService provides services related to HDB project applications for an applicant. It handles application submission, project eligibility checks, enquiries, and withdrawal requests.

    • haveProject

      public boolean haveProject()
      Checks whether the applicant has already applied for a project.
      Specified by:
      haveProject in interface IApplicantService
      Returns:
      true if the applicant has a project, false otherwise

    • getVisibleProjects

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjects()
      Retrieves a list of visible projects that are currently open and for which the applicant is eligible based on age and marital status.
      Specified by:
      getVisibleProjects in interface IApplicantService
      Returns:
      list of eligible visible projects

    • isEligibleForProject

      public boolean isEligibleForProject(Project project)
      Checks if the applicant is eligible for the specified project. Single applicants must be at least 35 years old, and non-single applicants must be at least 21.
      Specified by:
      isEligibleForProject in interface IApplicantService
      Parameters:
      project - the project to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise

      Creates a new application for a specific project and flat type.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Checks if the applicant's application is successful and allows flat booking.
      Specified by:
      isAvailableToBookFlat in interface IApplicantService
      Returns:
      true if the application status is SUCCESSFUL, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found
